basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Pediococcus pentosaceus Pac 1.0 (MIC=5 nM), Lactobacillus plantarum 965 (MIC=7 nM), Lactobacillus casei subsp.casei NCDO 161 (MIC=20 nM), Lactobacillus casei NCDO 2713 (MIC=150 nM), Lactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714 (MIC=4 nM), Lactobacillus viridescens NCDO 1655 (MIC=2 nM), Pediococcus pentosaceus NCDO 990 (MIC=30 nM), Lactobacillus sakei 706 (MIC=100 nM), Pediococcus acidilactici CH (MIC=10 nM), Lactobacillus curvatus 89 (MIC=5 nM). [PlnE:PlnF=1:1]
